Text:
how it started vs how it’s going:

 In 2017 I made a gender inclusive bathroom installation for an art project at school - before I’d fully realised I was queer (lol) 

yesterday, for #TransDayOfVisibility2023 , i unveiled my art for 
@BarclaysUK
 all-gender bathroom campaign

full circle moment! many tears were shed! 

here’s some slightly more clever sounding words I said about the art before I became a snivelling mess:

“My triptych is intended to be a thought provoking and joyful celebration of individuality - centring and celebrating our differences to empower us all to play our part in creating a more compassionate and liberated world.”

Due to rail strikes we are postponing our 
@grrrlzinefair
 workshop to next Saturday the 25th! We've had a few more tix become available, so get yours here : 
https://eventbrite.co.uk/e/hysterical-2023-feminist-zine-workshop-with-grrrl-zine-fair-tickets-530285196297…
Thank you to everyone who came to the opening of Hysterical last night! Hysterical is open to the public from the 15-25th of March at Bermondsey Project Space Gallery  See you there!
Thank you to everyone who came to the opening of Hysterical last night! Hysterical is open to the public from the 15-25th of March at Bermondsey Project Space Gallery  See you there!
having a bad day  can everyone please send hot pictures of their dads when they were young

#BookTwitter we need your help! I run Book Bodega, an Indy bookshop in Ramsgate. Winter is killing us, it’s soo quiet & we need to make £800 by Tuesday to pay our bills. This is my current view = no customers . Please shop with us and help us stay open!
https://uk.bookshop.org/shop/bookbodega

The Birth of Venus, painted by Sandro Botticelli in 1485, is one of the world's most famous and beloved paintings.

But it was completely forgotten for nearly four hundred years because nobody thought it was any good.

So... what changed?

URGENT: HYSTERICAL OPENING DATE CHANGE

Due to tube strikes, Hysterical 2023 Private View will now be happening on the 14th of March, 6pm at Bermondsey Project Space Gallery. We hope to see you there!

I'm in shock.

Texas has introduced a bill (SB1029) to effectively BAN ALL GENDER AFFIRMING CARE COVERAGE FOR ALL AGES. If a Doctor or Insurance provides gender affirming care they could be sued for malpractice.
sorry ur dad died that’s so unforch

A 16 year old girl has been murdered, taken from her friends and family when her life was only just beginning. I cannot fathom the callousness involved in making the editorial decision to violate her dignity in death.

Disgusting from 
@thetimes
.

it sucks so bad when self care actually works. like okay cleaning my room actually improved my mood and lowered my overall stress what a simple unoriginal bitch i am.
do they even understand the impact of “in another life i would’ve been happy doing laundry and taxes with you” do they know the cultural shift they made happen

sorry I can’t go out tonight I’ve gotta lay in my bed and rub my feet together like a freaky little cricket
sorry for fire reacting your mental breakdown i thought you were doing a bit

eating soup like the little slut i am

To heal, it’s important to understand healthy emotional responsibility. 

This looks like:

- if someone’s upset, they’ll need to directly communicate this to me

- if I’m upset, I need to directly communicate this to other people
there is nothing in the song monster mash that explicitly says it was a dance, it could have been an orgy

therapist: why did you do that 

me: ummm i don’t know babe u tell me
i don’t want to get up. i want to stay in bed until the day my grandson wins tickets to a chocolate factory
would love to be a healthy well-rested person but unfortunately I am committed to staying up extremely late and complaining about being tired
i think maybe instead of having kids I’m just going to have a modest collection of le creuset
im nonbinary bc i have boy pussy and girl autism
My plants are so god damn dramatic. Girl, get up. You’re not dead.
(at the dentist) u forgot to ask but i am sexually active
